sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Pakistan's former Prime Minister Imran Khan has been arrested, triggering protests and violence in many of the country's cities.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: According to his lawyers, the leader of the opposition was seized while attending the High Court building in Islamabad and was removed by security agents from the paramilitary National Accountability Bureau.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Police and government officials say that he was taken for questioning and a routine medical check-up. Some of Khan's lawyers and supporters were injured in the aftermath.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: In subsequent disturbances, at least one person was reported killed in Quetta, the capital of Balochistan province.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: There are reports of several wounded also in Karachi, Peshawar, Rawalpindi and Lahore.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Khan's arrest came hours after he issued a video message before heading to Islamabad, saying he was mentally prepared for arrest there.

sentences.sentence: The date is a symbolic one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: On May 9th, on the occasion of Europe Day, German Chancellor Olaf Scholz shared with MEPs in the European Parliament his vision for the EU in an ever-changing geopolitical landscape.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He says that Europe should not be intimidated by Russia, insisting that there is a need to act so that Kiev can prevail against the Kremlin's forces and reject Putin's vision of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: And at the same time, there is a great opportunity for Ukraine, not only for Ukraine, but for Europe as a whole. Because a prosperous, democratic, European Ukraine is the most significant defeat of Putin's imperial, revisionist, people's right-wing policy on our continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: To enable the EU to carry weight on the international stage, the German Chancellor defends reforming the bloc's rules.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: national stage, the German Chancellor defends reforming the bloc's rules. He wants to see an end to unanimous voting on foreign and fiscal policy, in order to promote qualified majority decision-making between member states. Not the unanimity, not 100% consent to all decisions creates the greatest possible democratic legitimacy.

sentences.sentence: It is precisely the advertising and ringing of majorities and alliances that distinguishes us as Democrats.

sentences.sentence: The German Chancellor believes that to avoid another Europe-wide conflict, the EU must strengthen itself as much as possible.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: All but two of 25 cruise missiles fired by Russia against Ukraine overnight on Tuesday were intercepted by the country's air defenses, the Ukrainian Air Force said in a statement.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian military warned earlier this week that Russia is trying to wear down Ukraine's air defenses ahead of an anticipated counteroffensive.

sentences.sentence: Russian forces have made marginal advances within Bakhmut as of the 8th of May. I mean, reports of intensified Wagner Group forces offensive operations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Russian sources claim that Wagner fighters intensified assaults on Ukrainian positions in western Bakhmut and shelling of the area.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Now, Ukrainian military officials reported that additional Wagner personnel arrived and are operating in the city, leading to an increased intensity of the assaults Ukrainians have not observed any indications that Wagner intends to leave the city and that intensified shelling likely indicates that Wagner has received more ammunition the Institute for the study of war says Wagner group leader Evgeny Prigozhin and Chechen leader Ramzan Kadyrov may have compelled the Russian theatre commander in Ukraine to resume artillery ammunition distribution to the Wagner forces in Bakhmut despite his desired deprioritization of that effort.

Russian occupation authorities are evacuating fromvsk area and Skadovsk city administrations and loaded documents, office equipment and other state property for transport out of this area.

sentences.sentence: The Russian president's become increasingly reliant on Prigozhin, who's frequently called for more ammunition and accused the Russian army of sabotaging his mercenaries' attempts to deliver a victory in Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: As fighting between rival military factions rages on, the UN says the number of people displaced in Sudan has doubled in a week, from 340 to 700,000.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The number of people internally displaced in Sudan has more than doubled in the last week, according to data that's been collected by the International Organization for Migration's displacement tracking matrix.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Now more than 700,000 people are now internally displaced by the fighting, which began on the 15th of April, according to this latest data.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: More than 150,000 people have left the country since the conflict began on the 15th of April.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: At the same briefing, the World Health Organization says 604 people have been killed and more than 5,000 injured since violence erupted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It was Germany's turn to host China's Foreign Minister Qin Gang, who's visiting Europe

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: this week as China seeks to mediate in Russia's war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Germany's Foreign Minister said China should step up as a permanent member of the UN Security Council and stressed the two sides in the conflict should not be treated on equal terms. In light of right and wrong, in light of an aggressor and a victim, neutrality means to stand on the side of the aggressor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The two ministers who are due to meet again in June also disagreed over potential EU sanctions on firms trading with Russia, with Xin Gang saying China would retaliate if Chinese companies were targeted for allegedly trading with Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: According to the Chinese foreign minister, there's normal exchange and cooperation between Chinese and Russian companies that should not be affected by possible sanctions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: On Chinese President Xi Jinping's diplomatic efforts, the minister said that Russian President Vladimir Putin had welcomed his call for negotiations and declared Russia was open to the possibility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Amid a backlash against gun violence, people in Serbia have begun handing in weapons to police stations across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It follows the murders last week of 17 people, many of them children, in two unrelated mass shootings. The firearms amnesty is one of several measures introduced by the government in response. As the initial shock gave way to anger, thousands took to the streets to protest against the government's approach to gun crime and a perceived promotion of violence in some media.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: As well as cracking down on illegal gun ownership, the government's also stepped up security at schools. But in a nation with a plentiful supply of weaponry left over from the Balkan wars, many feel these measures are too little, too late.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Hundreds of migrants have been evacuated from Lampedusa in southern Italy after nearly 2,000 people arrived on the island in less than three days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Monday, 650 people left thanks to a migrant emergency plan activated by Italy's far-right government. One thousand people still remain in the Contrada and Briacola reception centre, almost three times its maximum capacity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Good weather and improved sailing conditions have prompted more ships to set sail from North Africa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Italian government has declared a state of national immigration emergency for the next six months, which expedites the repatriation of migrants.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The interior minister says in the first four months of 2023, more than four times as many people have arrived in Italy compared to last year.
